message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. I'm trying to be a savvy buyer and get the best deal possible.
I understand your concerns, Bob, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of a price of $85. It's a great compromise, considering the product's value is worth $100 to you.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than $85. I'm thinking more along the lines of $75. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $75. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer you the product for $82. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still trying to get the best deal possible. I'm willing to go up to $78, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. I'm counting on you to meet me in the middle.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make another compromise. I'm thinking of a price of $81. It's a small increase from my previous offer, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. Let's see if we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
I'm getting close to my limit, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $79, but I need to be honest with you, I'm not sure if I can go any higher. I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm thinking of a price of $80. It's the highest I'm willing to go, but I'm willing to meet you at this price to finalize the deal. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
